channel.title: Posts on Ryan Dean's Github Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ryan Dean's Github Site

item.title: NCAA Bracket Follow Up: I am not smarter than my machine...
item.description: When it comes to March Madness this season I truly had no idea what was in store. I knew there were going to be upsets considering no one really played a very complete season, but never as many as there actually were. We had a bunch of Cinderella teams this year and it was amazing to see. After a year of seeing Abilene Christian it was amazing to see them get a win in the tournament.

item.title: March Sadness
item.description: If you’ve ever filled out a March Madness bracket, you can truly understand the realest definition of pain, insert Steven A. Smith “Pain” image here. This year however we are going in with a predictive method as to who is going to win. There is no guarentee that the method will prevail and more likely than not, it won’t. If I were able to perfectly predict every game and happen to win the million dollar prize I WILL be naming a classroom after myself.
